text: May 14, 2018 / 5:01 PM / Updated 42 minutes ago IPL Scoreboard Reuters Staff 3 Scoreboard at close of play on the first day of match 48 between Kings XI Punjab and Royal Challengers Bangalore on Monday at Indore, India Royal Challengers Bangalore win by 10 wickets Kings XI Punjab 1st innings Lokesh Rahul c Colin de Grandhomme b Umesh Yadav 21 Chris Gayle c Mohammed Siraj b Umesh Yadav 18 Karun Nair c Virat Kohli b Mohammed Siraj 1 Aaron Finch c Virat Kohli b Moeen Ali 26 Marcus Stoinis b Yuzvendra Chahal 2 Mayank Agarwal c Parthiv Patel b Colin de Grandhomme 2 Axar Patel Not Out 9 Ravichandran Ashwin Run Out (Sub) 0 Andrew Tye c Parthiv Patel b Umesh Yadav 0 Mohit Sharma Run Out AB de Villiers 3 Ankit Rajpoot Run Out Tim Southee 1 Extras 0b 2lb 0nb 0pen 3w 5 Total (15.1 overs) 88 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-36 Rahul, 2-41 Gayle, 3-41 Nair, 4-50 Stoinis, 5-61 Agarwal, 6-78 Finch, 7-78 Ashwin, 8-79 Tye, 9-84 Sharma, 10-88 Rajpoot Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Umesh Yadav 4 0 23 3 5.75 Tim Southee 2 0 19 0 9.50 Mohammed Siraj 3 0 17 1 5.67 1w Yuzvendra Chahal 2 0 6 1 3.00 Colin de Grandhomme 2 0 8 1 4.00 2w Moeen Ali 2.1 0 13 1 6.00 Royal Challengers Bangalore 1st innings Virat Kohli Not Out 48 Parthiv Patel Not Out 40 Extras 0b 2lb 1nb 0pen 1w 4 Total (8.1 overs) 92-0 Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Ravichandran Ashwin 1 0 9 0 9.00 Andrew Tye 4 0 33 0 8.25 Ankit Rajpoot 1.1 0 21 0 18.00 1w 1nb Mohit Sharma 1 0 15 0 15.00 Marcus Stoinis 1 0 12 0 12.00 Umpire Virender Sharma Umpire Bruce Oxenford Video C Nandan Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
